short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: get top 3 word occurences & enter a comma sepearated list to find occurences

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get page word count, number of headings and the top 3 repeating words, as well ass their respective number of occurrences in the headings as-well as the number of occurrences in the entire web page (excluding words such as "a", "the"...) 
-a newly added csv search feature to get the same metrics based on the words or phrases you type into the search box
-works in multiple languages.
